title: Alex Jones Show - 2013 Nov 15 FR [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Friday, 15 November 2013


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................

From the Infowars web site :: On this Friday, November 15 edition of The Alex Jones Show, Alex showcases the current implosion of the Obama administration as the president's deception is exposed. Obama is now on the defensive as the vast majority of Americans no longer trust him. 

Dan Bongino, a former member of the Secret Service's Presidential Protection Division, joins the show to talk about how Obamacare replaced his family's health coverage with more expensive yet lesser quality options. 

The August Forecast & Review Editor Patrick M. Wood also joins the show to discuss how the global elite within the Trilateral Commission are replacing capitalism with their own technocracy in order to create a New International Economic Order. Everything that we have reported on, from Obamacare to mass surveillance, ties back into their objective for a total awareness society.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents. 

 Think for yourself!
 To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
